ReportSection.title: Incrementation - New Appointments
ReportSection.ReportItem:
I am writing to inform you that you will receive a prorated increment as per Article A6.11.2 of Schedule A, which provides that an Academic Faculty member whose appointment takes effect in the period October 2 to June 1 (in the current academic year), inclusive, is eligible to receive a prorated increment. The award takes effect on July 1, {$next_year}.

I would like to take this opportunity to wish you success in your teaching, research and service
